charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to possess w/intent to dist more than 100 but less than 1,000 kilogs of marijuana; Title 21, USC 846, 841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(B); Offense date: 8/11/03; Penalty: Imprisonment for 5 yrs to 40 yrs and/or a $2,000, 000 fine &; at least a 4 yr SRT (1)
